commentBody: Very informative story. The Ideal Gas Law and lack of substantive evidence by the NFL should put Deflategate to rest. I guess it's easy for fans to find fault with a team and a franchise and winning quarterback when their own teams are either mismanaged, coached by bunglers or both. The Sour Grapes Law is older than the Ideal Gas Law and goes a long way in explaining the animosity leveled at Brady and the Patriots.
